name: Space Hawk
description:
This project was done to learn more and familiarize myself with different things: Coroutines, enemy waves in Scriptable Objects, sound and particle effects, layer collision matrix, etc.

The build has some visual bugs related to Canvas and cameras, mainly in Start Menu and Game Over screens, but since it's an exercice for an online course, I don't think I will work on it anymore. The main game loop is playable!

It's a good way to spend some time trying to get a better score, and it was an excellent learning exercice, but the result is nothing to write home about.
